author: realbigsean
content: Since transactions in the block  include blob versioned hashes, I think blob building has to be a builder responsibility. So the builder bid will need to include `blob_kzg_commitments` , and the revealed payload will have to include the blobs and kzg proof

author: terence0083
content: Well, the proposer no longer needs to sign over the sidecar. I think the most simple interaction is just to have the relayer broadcasts the `SignedBeaconBlockAndBlobsSidecar` and `submitBlindBlock` returns the `SignedBeaconBlockAndBlobsSidecar`

author: terence0083
content: What do you have in mind that the validator should do with the returned `blob_kzg_commitments` from `bid`?

author: realbigsean
content: This so that it can include it in the block and create a valid signature over the block

author: realbigsean
content: can't do any validation on it otherwise
